summary: A personal profile/portfolio app designed for advertising Amazon products, likely featuring product showcases, affiliate links, and personal branding.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wide hero banner with warm amber gradient, subtle bokeh lights, and abstract shopping/lifestyle background elements (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
- Neutral soft-tone product card placeholder illustration with a simple gift box and sparkle icons (product-placeholder.dim_400x400.png)
